intro: Brachystelma natalense, commonly known as Natal stonecrop, is a succulent plant native to South Africa. It belongs to the family Aizoaceae, which is characterized by its fleshy leaves and showy flowers. The plant produces small, star-shaped flowers in shades of yellow and orange, typically blooming in spring. It thrives in well-drained soils and requires full sun to partial shade. Due to its compact growth habit and ornamental flowers, it is a popular choice for rock gardens and xeriscaping.
